text:
wow. what a pathetic little shit this guy must be.

thanks for sharing.

i meant the rounded corners on the A. almost everything has sharp edges in this type, but the A's rounded corners dont match. it's just simple details like that, that make or break a type.

the F and A ligature / monogram looks alright to me. although the F indeed gets lost a bit.

please don't misunderstand this critique as me not liking anything about it. i think it's good work and if the client liked it, its a win. :)
